about.heading: Student. Teammate. Future meteorologist.
about.body:
I'm Kevin Franz Jr, a 6'2" guard in the Class of 2028 at [High School Name] in [City, State].

On the court, I'm a pace-pusher and playmaker – I love creating for teammates, defending full court, and making the right reads under pressure. Off the court, I'm just as serious about the classroom. I'm especially drawn to weather and atmospheric science and plan to study meteorology in college.

My goals are simple: help my team win, keep growing as a leader, and earn the opportunity to play college basketball while pursuing a degree that challenges me.
